Sentencas: The main motivation for this study was to analyze transient responses of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) during load variations, which can possibly cause fuel starvation within porous anode active layer and, consequently, accelerate the degradation rate of the SOFC.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: Simulation approach was taken into consideration.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: For this purpose, three-dimensional (3-D) dynamic model of a single, planar, anode supported SOFC was built.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: The model is also briefly presented in this paper.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: The paper focuses on detailed transient analysis of current density (I), power density (P), fuel utilization (FU) and electrical conversion efficiency (TO after a step change of voltage (load).
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: The simulation results also give us valuable data about local mass fractions of fuel species that cannot be measured in realistic devices.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: It is shown that fuel starvation occurs when the J (load) is increased by approximately 100% and FU is above 0.85 at final value of J (when steady state is assumed).
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: Moreover, the time-dependent profile of FU give us guideline for setting appropriate inlet flow rate of fuel to prevent fuel starvation.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: The results show that a SOFC with very thin (d(s) = 0.1 mm) porous anode support layer is prone to fuel starvation during large load variation.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: Using a thicker porous anode support layer (d(s) = 0.5 mm) is proposed to avoid fuel starvation and, consequently, mitigate the degradation of a realistic SOFC.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: The P and eta of modeled SOFC are also analyzed during large load variations.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: The eta increases with increasing the ds from 0.1 mm to 1.0 mm.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations

Sentencas: The results indicate the improvement of eta by appropriate design and control of a realistic SOFC.
Titulo: Modeling and analysis of short-period transient response of a single, planar, anode supported, solid oxide fuel cell during load variations
